intent_atoms.description: Add SwiftFormat enforcement to pre-push hook and CI workflow to maintain consistent code style across the project.
SwiftFormat must be run on all files before push and during CI; failures block merge.
All code must pass SwiftFormat checks in pre‑push and CI environments.
Use a pre‑push hook and GitHub Actions workflow to enforce SwiftFormat across the repository.

functional_units.name: Strict Concurrency Checks Automation
functional_units.description: Automated enforcement of Swift StrictConcurrency across all build and test phases via pre-push hooks and CI.

functional_units.name: SwiftFormat Formatting Enforcement
functional_units.description: Pre‑push hook and CI workflow that enforces consistent code style using SwiftFormat.

functional_units.name: SwiftLint Complexity Thresholds Reinforcement
functional_units.description: Restoration and enforcement of SwiftLint complexity thresholds (cyclomatic, function length, type length) to maintain code quality.

functional_units.name: Test Coverage Gate
functional_units.description: Integration of coverage_analysis.py into CI to enforce minimum test coverage thresholds.

functional_units.name: Duplication Detection Guard
functional_units.description: CI workflow using jscpd to detect and block copy/paste regressions in Swift code.

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Interactive Components
functional_units.description: Implementation of interactive SwiftUI components such as buttons, sliders, toggles, and other user input controls.

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore Concurrency Migration
functional_units.description: Migration of ParseIssueStore from GCD queues to @MainActor or custom actor isolation for Swift concurrency.

functional_units.name: Removal of @unchecked Sendable
functional_units.description: Elimination of @unchecked Sendable conformance after actor isolation is complete.

functional_units.name: Other Stores Migration
functional_units.description: Migrate remaining stores to Swift Concurrency following the ParseIssueStore pattern.
